articles.description: The US home retailer, once worth $17bn, looks destined to enter chapter 11 despite a market rally this week. What went wrong?
articles.content: Bed Bath & Beyond, the pioneering home goods retailer, appears to be heading for bankruptcy. But you wouldnt necessarily know it from visiting its flagship store in New Yorks Chelsea neighbourhoo… [+5128 chars]
